# ignition_database_connection (Data Source)

Reads a Database Connection from Ignition.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ignition_database_connection" "example" {
  name = "production_db"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the database connection.

### Read-Only

- `connect_url` (String) The JDBC connection URL.
- `type` (String) The type of the database connection.
- `username` (String) The username for the database connection.
